articles.title: India To Continue Experimentation In FIH Pro League Match Against Argentina
articles.description: The Indian men's hockey team would look to test their bench strength against Argentina in the two-legged FIH Pro League tie beginning here on Saturday.
articles.content: The Indian men's hockey team would look to continue its experimentation and test its bench strength ahead of a busy calendar year, despite suffering its second defeat in the tournament, when they take on Argentina in the two-legged FIH Pro League tie... [3708 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Wheat eases as Ukraine developments weigh; soy firm on Argentina risks
articles.description: (Updates with European trading) By Gus Trompiz and Rajendra Jadhav PARIS/MUMBAI, March 18 (Reuters) - Chicago wheat futures eased on Friday as traders monitored diplomatic efforts to end Russia's invasion of Ukraine and gauged continuing disruption to Black Sea grain exports. articles.title: Argentina's debt deal with IMF gets final legislative OK
articles.description: Argentinas Senate gave final legislative approval Thursday for President Alberto Fernndezs administration to refinance the governments USD 45 billion debt with the International Monetary Fund and avoid a default.The lawmakers voted 56 to 13, with three abstentions, to approve the deal signed with the IMF in early March.
articles.content:
Argentina's Senate gave final legislative approval Thursday for President Alberto Fernández's administration to refinance the government's USD 45 billion debt with the International Monetary Fund and avoid a default.
The lawmakers voted 56 to 13, wit... [2806 chars]

articles.title: Argentina soy, corn forecasts at risk of more cuts as yields disappoint, exchange says
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, March 17 (Reuters) - Argentina's 2021/22 soybean, corn and sunflower harvest forecasts could be cut further, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, citing lower than expected yields due to adverse weather conditions that have hit crops this year.The entity, which slashed corn and soy production estimates earlier in the year due to drought, currently

articles.title: Footballer Emiliano Sala died as result of plane crash, inquest jury finds
articles.description: The Argentina-born striker died from head and chest injuries but was deeply unconscious, having been poisoned by carbon monoxide.
articles.content:
FOOTBALLER EMILIANO SALA died as a result of a plane crash, having been overcome by toxic levels of carbon monoxide during an unlicensed commercial flight, an inquest jury has concluded.
The Argentina-born striker died from head and chest injuries bu... [3069 chars]

articles.title: Man City told not to expect instant impact from summer transfer Julian Alvarez
articles.description: Manchester City signed Argentina striker Julian Alvarez in January and he is expected to join the club properly in the summer.
articles.content:
Julian Alvarez will need time to adapt at Manchester City next season, former striker Paul Dickov has warned.
City signed Alvarez, 22, for £14m in January before sending him back on loan to River Plate until July. There had been talk in Argentina of ... [2344 chars]

articles.title: Study finds co-infected individuals carrying two distinct lineages of SARS-CoV-2 in Argentina
articles.description: Researchers used molecular surveillance to identify cases of co-infection with SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern Delta and Omicron reported in Argentina during December 2021 and January 2022.
